text: Instead of increasing competitiveness with China by prioritizing domestic workers, the COMPETES Act focuses on importing foreign workers to take American jobs. My colleagues & I are calling on House & Senate leadership to remove these harmful provisions. https://t.co/wDnejp2xZV
